LanguageData.VQEA_Spliceling.label: spliceling
LanguageData.VQEA_Spliceling.description: A bent and malformed mutant, vaguely resembling what was once a human. Its gaunt face is a patchwork of assorted features shifting onto itself without purpose. It moves erratically, seemingly driven by sudden bursts of sharp pain and an urge for violence. Though its thin stretched skin looks decently fragile, its unpredictability makes it a dangerous foe.\n\nIt is unclear whether a broken human consciousness still lingers inside, or if it is nothing more than a hollow puppet of scrambled genes.
LanguageData.VQEA_Spliceling.tools.0.label: left mutated fist
LanguageData.VQEA_Spliceling.tools.1.label: flesh club
LanguageData.VQEA_Spliceling.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicehulk.label: splicehulk
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicehulk.description: A swollen bloated mutant that quivers with every labored step. Its skin splits under its own weight, oozing yellow fluid from raw seams. Vaguely resembling what was once a human, its limbs of mismatched size flail clumsily at anything nearby. Somehow, it’s able to regenerate all wounds at an unnatural speed.\n\nWhile slow and ponderous, its immense bulk crushes obstacles with ease leaving little hope for anything caught in its path.
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicehulk.tools.0.label: left swollen arm
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicehulk.tools.1.label: right swollen arm
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicehulk.tools.2.label: body slam
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicefiend.label: splicefiend
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicefiend.description: A towering mutant angered and prodded by its endless agony. Its proportions are wildly distorted, with its arms dragging along the floor. Its bursting chest is stretched open wide with straining cords of flesh, as it walks with legs thick enough to shatter stone underfoot.\n\nUnlike its sluggish kin, the splicefiend moves with alarming speed and precision, overwhelming prey with violent charges and rending strikes.
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicefiend.tools.0.label: left massive fist
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicefiend.tools.1.label: right massive fist
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicetoot.label: splicetoot
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicetoot.description: A small, bloated mutant that crawls awkwardly on underdeveloped limbs, resembling a grotesque parody of a toddler. Its enlarged belly sloshes with rotstink gas, swelling and trembling with each jerking movement. Upon reaching its victim, the fragile body ruptures in a violent explosion, releasing a choking cloud of dangerous gas. Whether it was once a child or simply shaped to mock one is a cruelty too dreadful to think about.
LanguageData.VQEA_Splicetoot.tools.0.label: bite
